## Description

Briefly describe the changes introduced in this PR.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Feature (new functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (incompatible modification)
- [ ] Documentation

## Context & Ticket

Reference the associated Jira or GitHub ticket: `TICKET-XXX`

## Checklist

- [ ] Jira ticket number added to PR title
- [ ] Milestone assigned
- [ ] SonarQube report reviewed (coverage > 80%)
- [ ] Unit/Integration tests added or updated
- [ ] Tests executed locally with `mvn clean test`
- [ ] Maven build successful (`mvn clean verify`)
- [ ] Swagger/OpenAPI files updated if needed
- [ ] Changelog updated
- [ ] Documentation updated if applicable
- [ ] No credentials or secrets in the code

## Testing

- **Unit Tests**: Describe the tests added
- **Integration Tests**: Commands to reproduce the tests
- **Manual Tests**: Steps to validate the changes

## Additional Notes

Add any useful information for the reviewer (technical approach, architectural decisions, etc.).
